title: Music Pack - Dreamy Music Box
description: Enhance your game with 25 enchanting music box melodies for emotional depth and nostalgia!
longDescription:
Demo: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uM4Y-RO3pDI&t=93s&ab_channel=BellKalengar


Dreamy Music Box: Emotional Music Pack for Game Developers

Welcome to "Dreamy Music Box," a curated collection of 25 heartfelt music box tracks designed to elevate your game's atmosphere. Each track has been meticulously crafted to evoke emotions of nostalgia, wonder, and tranquility, making them ideal for a variety of game genres including indie games, visual novels, RPGs, and more.

Key Features:

  • 25 Unique Tracks in 5 Versatile Versions: Explore a diverse range of melodies, each with its own distinct mood and character. Each track includes 5 versions: Default, Reverb, High Pitched, Octaved, and Soft Keys, allowing you to seamlessly integrate the perfect sound for every moment in your game.
  • High-Quality Audio: Professionally mastered to ensure pristine sound quality.
  • Versatile Use: Perfect for cutscenes, menus, emotional moments, and background music to enhance storytelling.
  • Easy Integration: Compatible with all major game engines (WAV).

Whether you're a solo indie developer or part of a studio, "Dreamy Music Box" provides the perfect soundtrack to enrich your game's narrative and immerse players in a captivating audio experience!
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Wavs: 125

Number of Audio Cues: 125

Sample rate: 48000 Hz

Does music loop: Yes
